poem:
### Disjointed Harmony

A mess of our own making,  
where red banners fade to gray.  
Voices from the north speak,  
echoing discontent in the halls  
of power. A leader's shadow  
dances awkwardly, off beat,  
while the hopes of many falter  
against whispered promises  
lost in the wind.
